_notes.candidate_options: device can be 'cuda' or 'cuda:0' to run on GPU or 'cpu' to force CPU; use_8bit=true attempts 8-bit quantization; use_flash_attn toggles flash attention
_notes.judge_options: per-judge device settings; set device to 'cpu' if you want judges to run on CPU
_notes.general: mode: {candidate, judge, sequential, concurrent}. Set selected_judge to a judge id or index to run a single judge when mode=='judge'
